WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
Hello guys, typescript is Awesome, but i think it will be more amazing if there will be ability of Enum Inheritance.

Imagine:
``` typescript
enum Types {
    CoreType1,
    CoreType2
}

enum CategoryTypes extends Types {
    ExtraType1,
    ExtraType2,
    ExtraType3
}
```
It will be __Super Awesome__! and it's super easy to implement using power of js.

Please add this feature for 1.0 version.

_Huge thanks for Typescript,
Ezeki_

Comments.Message: Thanks for the suggestion, we will consider this for a future version of TypeScript. Unfortunately this probably won't make it for 1.0.
